TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MenuItem extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class MenuItem Inherits HeaderedItemsControl Implements ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示 內的可選取項目。

span.span: Represents a selectable item inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示其標頭和物件的集合可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. A可以有子功能表。A can have submenus. 中子功能表的中的物件由組成的。The submenu of the is made up of the objects within the of a . 它是很常見的來包含其他物件，以建立巢狀的子功能表。It is common for a to contain other objects to create nested submenus. A可以有數個函數的其中一個：A can have one of several functions: - 也可以選取要叫用命令。It can be selected to invoke a command. - 它可以是其他功能表項目分隔符號。It can be a separator for other menu items. - 它可以是子功能表的標頭。It can be a header for a submenu. - 它可以是 checked 或 unchecked。It can be checked or unchecked. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，的設。By default, the of a is set to . 預設的水平位置是。The default horizontal position of a is . 如果您設定屬性透過、 堆疊面板預設會套用和項目會置中。If you set the property of a through a , the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered. 控點事件，因此如果您附加至事件處理常式，永遠不會呼叫您的處理常式。The handles the event, so if you attach an event handler to , your handler will never be called. 若要加入您自己的處理常式，訂閱事件或訂閱藉由呼叫與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。To add your own handler, subscribe to the event or subscribe to by calling with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 自訂功能表項目控制項Customizing the MenuItem Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[功能表樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立操作中的文字。The following example creates a to manipulate text in a . 包含物件使用， ，和屬性和， ，和事件。The contains objects that use the , , and properties and the , , and events. [!code-xaml[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ Command { System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與功能表項目關聯的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.

value.span: 與 關聯的命令。

span.span: The command associated with the .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來建立與特定命令的關聯執行個體。This property is used to associate a command with a particular instance. 下列範例將**複製**命令搭配輸入的動作文字就會自動提供和**Ctrl + C**。The following example associates the **Copy** command with a and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**. 此範例不會設定屬性，但如「 複製 」 是在執行階段。The example does not set the property, but the for the is "Copy" at run time. 您可以指定另一個標頭如果您想要不同。You can specify another header for the if you want it to be different. 如需如何將繫結至所需的命令資訊，請參閱[新增命令至 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370). [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] 引發的命令時按一下 — 後方事件。A command is raised when a is clicked—just after the event. 根據下列優先順序的項目上引發的命令：The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1. 如果上設定，會使用該元素。If is set on the , that element is used. 2. 的包含。The of a that contains the . 3. 包含的主視窗的焦點目標。The focus target of the main window that contains a . 4. 按下的 。The that was clicked. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用功能表項目與相關命令的命令屬性。The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items. [!code-xaml[MenuEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#8)] [!code-csharp[MenuEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)]

value.span: 在其上引發指定之命令的項目。

span.span: The element on which to raise the specified command.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定命令的發生位置的項目。The property specifies the element where the command occurs. 如果未設定，具有鍵盤焦點的項目將會收到命令。If is not set, the element that has keyboard focus will receive the command. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

value.span: 出現在 中的圖示。

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多控制項中有不只是文字項目。Many controls have more than just text in the elements. 通常沒有圖示、 核取記號、 加速器以及箭號代表子功能表。Often there are icons, check marks, accelerators, and arrows to indicate submenus. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立功能表項目，並以圖示。The following example creates a menu item with an icon. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InputGestureText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定描述輸入筆勢的文字，該輸入筆勢會呼叫繫結至指定項目的命令。

span.span: Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.

value.span: 描述輸入的動作，例如文字**Ctrl + C**如**複製**命令。

span.span: The text that describes the input gesture, such as **Ctrl+C** for the **Copy** command.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不將輸入的筆勢關聯功能表項目。它只會將文字加入功能表項目。This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item. 應用程式必須處理使用者的輸入，才能執行動作。The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action. 如需如何建立命令和功能表項目關聯的資訊，請參閱。For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用屬性設為功能表項目指派鍵盤快速鍵文字。The following examples show how to use the property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，屬性具有受保護的 setter。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the property has a protected setter. 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設.NET Framework 3.5 版。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何判斷功能表項目會反白顯示。The following example shows how to determine whether a menu item is highlighted. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，屬性具有受保護的 setter。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the property has a protected setter. 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設.NET Framework 3.5 版。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用中功能表項目樣式屬性。The following example shows how to use the property in a menu item style. 功能表項目按下時，其前景、 文字大小，以及文字樣式會變更的樣式。When the menu item is pressed, the style of its foreground, text size, and text style change. [!code-xaml[MenuItemsStyle_snip#MenuItemsIsPressed](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemsStyle_snip/CSharp/MyApp.xaml#menuitemsispressed)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設為`true`，滑鼠捕捉設和其樹狀子結構。When is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the and its subtree. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟子功能表的。The following example shows how to open a submenu of a . 在此範例中，呼叫`fileMenu`包含呼叫`recentFiles`，具有子功能表。In this example, the called `fileMenu` contains a called `recentFiles` that has a submenu. 當`fileMenu`開啟時，就會引發事件和`FileMenu_Opened`事件處理常式會開啟子功能表中的`recentFiles`。When `fileMenu` is opened, the event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsesItemContainerTemplate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出功能表是否會根據基礎集合中的項目類型或其他啟發學習法，選取不同的項目容器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.

value.span: 如果功能表會選取不同的項目容器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, .

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性相當實用，如果您想要建立繫結至集合的功能表。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. 項目容器會顯示物件集合中的 UI 項目。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果您想要繫結至集合，若要建立包含功能表物件和物件，設定屬性設為 true，並建立每種類型的集合中的物件。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每個必須包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
